tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Well! I don’t know where to begin, but I’ll start from my childhood friend Dr Sachin Mishra (BDS),he’s the one took the responsibility in me and recommend to Dr Abhishek Chauhan (MDS - Oral & Maxillofacial Surgery, BDS) & His wife Dr. Ankita Chauhan (Implantologist) both have good experience in their relevant field and a  Good friend of Dr Sachin & now there mine too:). Absolutely wonderful people. They Run an hospital called SHARAN,name itself describe SHELTER correct me if I’m wrong. Will start in 2 steps, Talking about my treatment I had to have an emergency (Plural Diastemata) this year as I was leaving for USA.And I don’t want to do this Plural Diastemta in (USA) as the dental care stuff is more expensive then here so I thought to do here with the help of  Dr Sachin.The Frist step of my Diastemta is start with Frenectomy Which is to be operate by Dr Abhishek that took 2 hours for that procedure is a small fold of tissue attached to center of my upper lip gap between the upper front teeth it was done on Sunday so I haven’t get the chance to see or interact with his staff as they have off on weekend. Dr.Abhishek he is very professional, yet personable and really care about my health and happiness. Working with Dr. Abhishek is always a pleasant experience with him END of Story Dr, Abhishek J.The Diastemata Second Step or  I can say The whole procedure apart from Frenectomy Which is done by Dr.Ankita. I still remember when they called me to visit there clinic to see me and click my tooth picture as part of dentistry. So I Went into their clinic and was greeted by a very friendly staff and felt comfortable through the entire process. Within my first visit I knew this office would be my primary dental office. From the receptionist, dental assistance, and the doctor- I felt like a valued patient. They both  knew I had a bad fear so  they talked me through the whole thing and made me laugh quite a bit to lighten the mood Not just for people who are very fearful of getting dental work done like myself, but also because they both is a Grade A professional at their craft.Dr.Ankita ** *** **** ** ********* *** has a great team of family and staff. They are all top of the line professionals, with superb workwomen ship, artistry and state of the art equipment. A lab on site, and TV/DVD for his/her patients to watch while waiting, or just to relax, if they wish. They have other Hi-Tech equipment, as well, to achieve a precision alignment, which goes hand in hand with that perfect smile. I Was having poor teeth for about 15 years. She has transformed all of my ugly teeth into a beautiful smile.my teeth look better now, than when I was 25. I thought there was no hope, unless I spent a fortune. Their fees are very reasonable, and affordable for all incomes, and She will work with you. She is very caring, compassionate, and patient with a desire to make her patients happy with their results. Dr. Ankita is also very good with children, and has a way of making them calm and relaxed. She will always be my dentist, and even though I will be living hundreds of miles away, I will fly or drive to SHARAN Smile Dental, for all of my dental needs. If you need quality work, at an affordable price, then you need to call Dr. Abhishek or Dr.Ankita to set up an appointment. You will thank God you did. I do every day....Thank you so much!

Thank you Dr. Ankita  for the great experience and quality work you have done on my teeth. I am usually apprehensive about needles and it was no sweat at all. In fact, I am ready for the next needle, thanks to your gentle touch. My family and I have been pleased with your professional, yet personable, service.

See you soon.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Abhishek and Dr. Ankita both are very ******* *** talented doctors that I have come across. I had fobia of visiting Dentists after my bad experience **** **** ** *** *********** ********* but through my family I came to know about them, since it was family recommended I thought to take a chance, trust me I regret that why I didn't took this chance earlier.**** *** ** *** *** **** *** **** ******** ******** **** ***** ********* *** **** ******* 

I have not yet finished my complete treatment yet, but I am very confident that it will be a seamless and successful treatment.

Basis on my experience so far, I can blindly recommend Dr. Abhishek and Dr. Ankita to all those who are fobiac about visiting Dentists because of unbearable pain, just visit them once and you will definitely understand why I am so positive about them.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Dental Surgery,Dental Crowns,Dental Implant Fixing,Dental X-Ray,
review:
With the complexity of treatment I was in need of , it was very important to find the best dentist in the city. From the first day of the treatment I was in the comfort zone. Dr. Ankita is very approachable , friendly, polite and easy to understand. She has super steady hands, great hand to eye coordination and is very good with all kinds of procedures, like taking accurate measurements and precise operating procedures like injecting, root canal procedures, stitches,etc. - Ex: during a root canal she pulled the whole dead root out in one go. Her way of working defines *** ********* ********* ** ********* * she's well versed with all the latest trends, equipment and technology. She also has an artistic influence ***** ***** *** * ****** ******* ************* No matter how complex the treatment is - with her ********* *** soft skills, it makes the treatment a pleasant experience. After a long experience ,I can say it with conviction that she's one of the finest. 

Thank you! :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: My smile makeover was greatly done. The overall treatment was very satisfactory and was completed much earlier than expected. Even the tooth extraction was painless and moreover the braces were very comfortable. I m very happy with the treatment. I would really recommend them.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Wait time,
review: From a person who is scared to sit in that dentist chair and wont trust much people when it comes to dental health issue perspective i would like to say that Dr Ankita is an amazing practitioner. She is calm and explains the situation well. gives you a proper outlook of what are the possiblities. *** ** *** ********* ****** her working technique puts you into a relaxed zone insted of panic zone. She is very frieldly in nature and professionally advanced.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Crowns and Bridges Fixing,Root Canal Treatment (RCT),Tooth Extraction,
review: Dr. Ankita is very polite and easy to understand. She has super steady hands and she is very good with all kinds of procedures, like taking accurate measurements and precise operating procedures like injecting, root canal procedures, stitches,etc. - Ex: during a tooth extraction she pulled out the tooth in one go. I had visited  3-4 dentist earlier but i have never got permanent solution on my teeth problem. Now i'm satisfied with my treatment from Dr. Ankita chauhan.  After a long experience ,I can say it with conviction that she's one of the finest dentist I met.

tags: None
review: She is well trained dentist,it was my very first dental treatment which she treated nicely also guided me with proper instructions and even there is tremendous improvement to my teeth which is positive response as per my point of view. I would like to appreciate about her treatment and definitely I will recommend to my relatives and close friends to consult her whenever they will have a dental problem.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Very good doctor , good experience, perfect treatment, treatment charge also reasonable , good neat and tidy clinic, very well located

tags: None
review: My mom visited Dr. Ankita with a terrible toothache. Weary of any dental treatment my mom was constantly reassured with utmost politeness. The treatment was done with thoroughly sterilized instruments. My mom left with a smile on her face and that says a lot for someone who was too scared to even sit on the dental chair. All thanks to Dr. Ankita.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: My kid had lot of pain. She was not able to chew on food and sleep at night. She is 3.5yr old. And was not able to sit for a long time for her dental treatment. On our friends recommendation we consulted Dr Ankita Chauhan for her treatment under general anethesia. She is very polite and explained us the procedure very well and made us feel very comfortable throughout. *** ** *** **** **** ******* ** **********

tags: Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: I had been to Dr Ankita for my braces treatment..she suggested me invisalign since I was very keen on getting my teeth aligned without the metal braces.The treatment was quite quick.And has proven wonderful results. Would definately recommend Dr Ankita .Thumbs up for their hospitality .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: I've been to many dentists but never met such a amazing dentist...the way she does her work calmly and with utter care...Also her friendliness makes you feel comfortable and relaxed...It was actually good to be treated under professionalism and care...I'm glad that she has become my family dentist now!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Very friendly surrounding. Staff are very helpful. Doctor Ankita is very kind person, she treat her patient very well.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Had been to Dr Ankita for straightening of teeth. She is very efficient *** ******** in her work.Would definitely recommend everyone.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Clinic is very hygienic. Safe is friendly . She give us and satisfactory answer along with the treatment. In short very nice doctor .
